00017 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }

00019 CSettingsMenu::CSettingsMenu( Uint8 dlgtheme, CExeFile &ExeFile, stOption *p_option, bool &restartVideo, int selection )
00020 : CBaseMenu(dlgtheme),
00021 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00022 mp_SubMenu(NULL),
00023 mp_option(p_option),
00024 m_restartVideo(restartVideo),
00025 m_profileselection(0)
00026 {
00027  CSettingsMenu::CSettingsMenu( dlgtheme, ExeFile, p_option, restartVideo );
00028  m_selection = selection;
00029 }

00031 CSettingsMenu::CSettingsMenu( Uint8 dlgtheme, CExeFile &ExeFile, stOption *p_option, bool &restartVideo ) :
00032 CBaseMenu(dlgtheme),
00033 m_ExeFile(ExeFile),
00034 mp_SubMenu(NULL),
00035 mp_option(p_option),
00036 m_restartVideo(restartVideo),
00037 m_profileselection(0)
00038 {
00039  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(13, 7, INPUT_MODE_UP_DOWN,m_dlg_theme);
00040 
00041  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 1, "Graphics");
00042  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 2, "Audio");
00043  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, "Options");
00044  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 4, "Controls");
00045  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 5, "Profile");
00046 }
00047 
00048 void CSettingsMenu::processSpecific()
00049 {
00050  if(!mp_SubMenu)
00051  {
00052   if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION)
00053   {
00054    switch(m_selection)
00055    {
00056    case 0: mp_SubMenu = new CVideoSettings(m_dlg_theme, m_restartVideo); break;
00057    case 1: mp_SubMenu = new CAudioSettings(m_dlg_theme, m_ExeFile); break;
00058    case 2: mp_SubMenu = new COptions(m_dlg_theme, mp_option); break;
00059    case 3: mp_SubMenu = new CControlsettings(m_dlg_theme); break;
00060    case 4: mp_SubMenu = new CProfilesMenu(m_dlg_theme); break;
00061    }
00062 
00063    m_selection = NO_SELECTION;
00064    m_suspended = true;
00065   }
00066  }
00067  else
00068  {
00069   mp_SubMenu->processCommon();
00070   mp_SubMenu->processSpecific();
00071   mp_SubMenu->postProcess();
00072 
00073   if(mp_SubMenu->mustClose())
00074   {
00075    SAFE_DELETE(mp_SubMenu);
00076    m_suspended = false;
00077   }
00078  }
00079 }
